title: Not a satisfactory phone
content: 1. With reference to the price Camera quality not too good & very few settings. No wide range lens. 2. Charging time more than 1 hour it takes even with 33W SuperVooc Charger which is not expected. This is what disappoints me so I don't suggest. 3. Sound quality is also satisfactory.  This is the 2nd phone I got after replacement as 1st one use to take more than 2 .5hrs to charge. 4. No Compass & level meter which is this price segment most of the other companies provides it. 5. Battery should have been 6000MAH which is not. Amazon delivery & response was good. But ONEPLUS has disappointed it's customer.
